original_text: He who brought the news answered and said, “Israel has fled before the Philistines, and there has also been a great defeat among the people. Your two sons also, Hophni and Phinehas, are dead, and the ark of God has been captured.”
korean_text: 소식을 전하는 자가 대답하여 이르되 이스라엘이 블레셋 사람들 앞에서 도망하였고 백성 중에는 큰 살륙이 있었고 당신의 두 아들 홉니와 비느하스도 죽임을 당하였고 하나님의 궤는 빼앗겼나이다

sentences.original_text: He who brought the news answered and said,
Israel has fled before the Philistines,
and there has also been a great defeat among the people.
Your two sons also, Hophni and Phinehas, are dead,
sentences.korean_translation: 당신의 두 아들 홉니와 비느하스도 죽었고,

sentences.original_text: and the ark of God has been captured.
